front.title: Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Registration of the Text- turntaking Media Feature Tag

abstract.t: This memo defines a new Media Feature Tag "text-turntaking" for use in SIP registration and session establishment. This is used to indicate if a device capable of text communication has limitations in its capabilities requiring the users to apply some turn-taking habits.To the RFC editor Please replace y.y with the assigned ASN.1 identifier and XXXX with the RFC number of this specification.
